00030 #define SQR(x)  (x)*(x)
00031 
00032 void expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* V, double* a)
00033 {
00034   int i;
00035   int k,m;
00036 
00037   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00038     a[i] = 0.0;
00039     for (m=0; m<n; m++)
00040       for (k=0; k<n; k++)
00041         a[i] += conj(V[k+i*n])*A[k+m*n]*V[m+i*n];
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 double angroot(double j2)
00047 {
00048   return (-0.5+sqrt(j2+0.25));
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 typedef struct {
00053   int idx;
00054   double rank;
00055   double e;
00056   double j2;
00057   double l2;
00058   double hosci;
00059   double t3;
00060 } SingleParticleState;
00061 
00062 
00063 int cmpSingleParticleState(SingleParticleState* spa, SingleParticleState* spb)
00064 {
00065   if (spa->rank < spb->rank)
00066     return +1;
00067   else
00068     return -1;
00069 }

00072 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00073 {
00074   createinfo(argc, argv);
00075   
00076   if (argc < 3) {
00077     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction slaterdetfile\n"
00078             "\n   -s           sort sp states according to n, l, j"
00079             "\n   -V           use only potential"
00080             "\n   -O OMEGA     use oscillator constant [MeV]"
00081             "\n   -T           T-Tcm"
00082                                 "\n   -p            no frame, no annotation"
00083                                 "\n   -g            debug"
00084                                 "\n   -q            quiet"
00085                                 "\n   -C LOGO       show logo"
00086                                 "\n   -o            reorient"
00087                                 "\n   -n            plain"
00088                                 "\n   -l LABEL  use label"
00089                                 "\n   -v {xy|yz|xz} select view"
00090                                 "\n   -x RANGE      coordinate range"
00091                                 "\n   -m RANGE  momentum range\n",
00092                 argv[0]);
00093     exit(-1);
00094   }
00095 
00096   int c;
00097   int nljorder=0;
00098   int potentialonly=0;
00099   int cm=0;
00100   double omega=0.0;
00101   int debug=0, quiet=0;
00102   int coordinate=0; int momentum=0;
00103   int orient=0;
00104   int view[3] = {1, 1, 1};
00105   int nplots[2] = {2, 3};
00106   int plain=0;
00107   
00108   double xmax=5.5;
00109   double pmax=3.5;
00110   const int npoints=40;
00111   char* logo = NULL;
00112   char* label = NULL;
00113   
00114     
00115   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "sVTO:v:c:oc:m:nl:ogC:qv:")) != -1)
00116     switch (c) {
00117     case 's':
00118       nljorder = 1;
00119       break;
00120     case 'V':
00121       potentialonly=1;
00122       break;
00123     case 'T':
00124       cm = 1;
00125       break;
00126     case 'O':
00127       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00128       break;
00129                 case 'g':
00130                         debug=1;
00131                         break;
00132                 case 'q':
00133                         quiet=1;
00134                         break;
00135                 case 'n':
00136                         plain=1;
00137                         break;
00138                 case 'o':
00139                         orient=1;
00140                         break;
00141                 case 'C':
00142                         logo = optarg;
00143                         break;
00144                 case 'l':
00145                         label=optarg;
00146                         break;
00147                 case 'c':
00148                         coordinate = 1;
00149                         xmax = atof(optarg);
00150                         break;
00151                 case 'm':
00152                         momentum = 1;
00153                         pmax = atof(optarg);
00154                         break;
00155                 case 'v':
00156                         view[0]=0; view[1]=0; view[2]=0;
00157                         nplots[1] = 1;
00158                         if (!strcmp(optarg, "xy")) view[2]=1;
00159                         if (!strcmp(optarg, "xz")) view[1]=1;
00160                         if (!strcmp(optarg, "yz")) view[0]=1;
00161                         break;
00162     }
00163         
00164         if (!(coordinate || momentum)) {
00165                 coordinate = 1;
00166                 momentum = 1;
00167         }
00168 
00169         nplots[0] = (coordinate && momentum) ? 2 : 1;
00170   
00171   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00172   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind+1];
00173 
00174   Interaction Int;
00175   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00176     exit(-1);
00177   Int.cm = cm;
00178 
00179   SlaterDet Q;
00180   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile))
00181     exit(-1);
00182 
00183   // number of nucleons
00184   int A = Q.A;
00185 
00186   // single-particle overlap matrix
00187   SlaterDetAux X;
00188   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00189   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00190 
00191   if (orient) {
00192           orientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00193           calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00194   }
00195   
00196   // Tcm
00197   double tcm;
00198   calcTCM(&Q, &X, &tcm);
00199 
00200   // derive oscillator constant from center of mass motion
00201   double omegacm = 4.0/3.0*tcm;
00202 
00203   if (omega == 0.0)
00204     omega = omegacm;
00205 
00206   complex double n[A*A];
00207   copycmat(A, X.n, n);
00208 
00209   // hartree-fock matrix in Gaussian single-particle basis
00210 
00211   complex double hhf[A*A];
00212   if (potentialonly)    calcPotentialHF(&Int, &Q, &X, hhf);
00213   else                  calcHamiltonianHF(&Int, &Q, &X, hhf);
00214   
00215   complex double l2hf[A*A];
00216   calcl2HF(&Q, &X, l2hf);
00217   
00218   complex double j2hf[A*A];
00219   calcj2HF(&Q, &X, j2hf);
00220 
00221   complex double hoscihf[A*A];
00222   calcHOsciHF(&Q, &X, omega, hoscihf);
00223 
00224   complex double t3hf[A*A];
00225   calct3HF(&Q, &X, t3hf);
00226   
00227   // solve eigenvalue problem
00228   complex double lambda[A];
00229   complex double V[A*A];
00230   int dim;
00231 
00232   if (nljorder) {
00233     complex double nljhf[A*A];
00234     int i;
00235     for (i=0; i<A*A; i++)
00236       nljhf[i] = 10000*hoscihf[i]/omega - 100*j2hf[i] + l2hf[i];
00237 
00238       generalizedeigensystem(nljhf, n, A, 0.0, lambda, V, &dim);
00239   } else
00240     generalizedeigensystem(hhf, n, A, 0.0, lambda, V, &dim);
00241 
00242   // calculate expectation values
00243   double norm[A];
00244   expect(A, n, V, norm);
00245 
00246   double h[A];
00247   expect(A, hhf, V, h);
00248 
00249   double l2[A];
00250   expect(A, l2hf, V, l2);
00251   
00252   double j2[A];
00253   expect(A, j2hf, V, j2);
00254 
00255   double hosci[A];
00256   expect(A, hoscihf, V, hosci);
00257 
00258   double t3[A];
00259   expect(A, t3hf, V, t3);
00260 
00261   fprintinfo(stdout);
00262 
00263   // sort single-particle states by energy
00264   SingleParticleState sp[A];
00265 
00266   int i;
00267   for (i=0; i<A; i++) {
00268     sp[i].idx = i;
00269     sp[i].rank = lambda[i];
00270     sp[i].e = h[i]/norm[i];
00271     sp[i].j2 = j2[i]/norm[i];
00272     sp[i].l2 = l2[i]/norm[i];
00273     sp[i].hosci = hosci[i]/norm[i];
00274     sp[i].t3 = t3[i]/norm[i];
00275   }     
00276   
00277   qsort(sp, A, sizeof(SingleParticleState), cmpSingleParticleState);
00278 
00279         if (!label)
00280                 label = nucleusIDLformat(nucleusname(Q.A, Q.Z));
00281   
00282         double* dens = malloc(3*SQR(npoints)*A*sizeof(double));
00283   
00284         // write densities to data files
00285 
00286         char datafile[255];
00287         FILE *datafp;
00288         int v;
00289         int j,k,m;
00290 
00291         int idx;
00292         for (idx=0; idx<A; idx++) {
00293                 snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s.%d.hfdens", slaterdetfile, idx);
00294                 if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00295                         fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00296                         exit(-1);
00297                 }
00298 
00299                 // coordinate space densities
00300                 if (coordinate) {
00301                         for (v=0; v<3; v++)
00302                                 if (view[v]) {
00303                                 complex double* densxhf = malloc(3*SQR(npoints)*A*A*sizeof(complex double));
00304                                 calcDensitiesCoordinateHF(&Q, &X, v, npoints, xmax, densxhf);
00305                                 
00306                                 for (j=0; j<SQR(npoints); j++) {
00307                                         for (i=0; i<A; i++) {
00308                                                 dens[j+i*3*SQR(npoints)] = 0.0;
00309                                                 for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00310                                                         for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00311                                                                 dens[j+i*3*SQR(npoints)] += conj(V[k+i*A])*densxhf[j+k*3*SQR(npoints)+m*A*3*SQR(npoints)]*V[m+i*A];
00312                                         }
00313                                 }
00314                                 free(densxhf);
00315                                 
00316                                 for (j=0; j<npoints; j++) {
00317                                         for (k=0; k<npoints; k++)
00318                                                 fprintf(datafp, "%f  ", dens[k+j*npoints+3*idx*SQR(npoints)]/rho0/norm[idx]);
00319                                         fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00320                                 }
00321                                 }
00322                 }
00323 
00324         // momentum space densities
00325                                 if (momentum) {
00326                                         for (v=0; v<3; v++)
00327                                                 if (view[v]) {
00328                                                 complex double* densphf = malloc(3*SQR(npoints)*A*A*sizeof(complex double));
00329                                                 calcDensitiesMomentumHF(&Q, &X, v, npoints, pmax, densphf);
00330                                                 
00331                                                 for (j=0; j<SQR(npoints); j++) {
00332                                                         for (i=0; i<A; i++) {
00333                                                                 dens[j+i*3*SQR(npoints)] = 0.0;
00334                                                                 for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00335                                                                         for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00336                                                                                 dens[j+i*3*SQR(npoints)] += conj(V[k+i*A])*densphf[j+k*3*SQR(npoints)+m*A*3*SQR(npoints)]*V[m+i*A];
00337                                                         }
00338                                                 }
00339                                                 free(densphf);
00340                                                 
00341                                                 for (j=0; j<npoints; j++) {
00342                                                         for (k=0; k<npoints; k++)
00343                                                                 fprintf(datafp, "%f  ", dens[k+j*npoints+3*idx*SQR(npoints)]/norm[idx]);
00344                                                         fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00345                                                 }
00346                                                 }
00347                                 }
00348                 
00349         fclose(datafp);
00350         
00351         // writing IDL script
00352 
00353         char scriptfile[255];
00354         FILE* scriptfp;
00355 
00356         char* fmdhome;
00357 
00358         if (!(fmdhome = getenv("FMD"))) {
00359                 fprintf(stderr, "environment variable FMD not defined\n");
00360                 exit(-1);
00361         }
00362 
00363         snprintf(scriptfile, 255, "%s.%d.hfdens.script", slaterdetfile, idx);
00364         if (!(scriptfp = fopen(scriptfile, "w"))) {
00365                 fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", scriptfile);
00366                 exit(-1);
00367         }
00368 
00369         fprintf(scriptfp, 
00370                         "; plot densities of nuclei\n; written by calchfdens\n\n");
00371         fprintf(scriptfp, "dens=fltarr(%d,%d,%d)\n", 
00372                         npoints, npoints, nplots[0]*nplots[1]);
00373 
00374         fprintf(scriptfp, "!path = '%s/lib:' + !path\n", fmdhome);
00375         fprintf(scriptfp, "openr, unit, '%s', /get_lun\n", datafile);
00376         fprintf(scriptfp, "readf, unit, dens\n");
00377         fprintf(scriptfp, "free_lun, unit\n");
00378   
00379         fprintf(scriptfp, "\n.run multipost, densityplot\n");
00380         fprintf(scriptfp, 
00381                         "pos = initpost('%s.%d.hfdens.eps',%d,%d, gapx=1.5, gapy=1.5, /color)\n",
00382                         slaterdetfile, idx, nplots[0], nplots[1]);
00383         fprintf(scriptfp, "!x.minor = 4\n!y.minor = 4\n");
00384         fprintf(scriptfp, "loadct, 3\n");
00385 
00386         i = -1;
00387 
00388         if (coordinate) {
00389                 for (v=0; v<3; v++) {
00390                         if (view[v]) {
00391                                 i++;
00392                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(%d,*)\n", i);
00393                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "densityplot, dens(*,*,%d), %d, %f, %f, %f, %f, $\n",
00394                                                 i, v, -xmax, xmax, -xmax, xmax);
00395                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/cut, /coordinate, /cont, /dens");
00396                                 if (plain) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noframe, /noannot");
00397                                 else {
00398                                         fprintf(scriptfp, ", key = '%s'", label);
00399                                         if (logo && nplots[0] == 1) fprintf(scriptfp, ", logo = '%s'", logo);
00400                                 } 
00401                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "\n");
00402                         }
00403                 }
00404         }
00405 
00406         if (momentum) {
00407                 for (v=0; v<3; v++) {
00408                         if (view[v]) {
00409                                 i++;
00410                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(%d,*)\n", i);
00411                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "densityplot, dens(*,*,%d), %d, %f, %f, %f, %f, $\n",
00412                                                 i, v, -pmax, pmax, -pmax, pmax);
00413                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/cut, /momentum, /cont, /dens");
00414                                 if (plain) fprintf(scriptfp, ", /noframe, /noannot");
00415                                 else {
00416                                         fprintf(scriptfp, ", key = '%s'", label);
00417                                         if (logo) fprintf(scriptfp, ", logo = '%s'", logo);
00418                                 }
00419                                 fprintf(scriptfp, "\n");
00420                         }
00421                 }
00422         }
00423

00425 
00426   // calling IDL
00427 
00428         char call[255];

00430         snprintf(call, 255, "idl < %s", scriptfile);
00431         system(call);
00432 
00433         char epsfile[255];
00434         snprintf(epsfile, 255, "%s.%d.hfdens.eps", slaterdetfile, idx);
00435 
00436   // calling gv
00437 
00438         if (!quiet) {
00439                 snprintf(call, 255, "gv %s &", epsfile);
00440                 system(call);
00441         }
00442 
00443   // clean up
00444 
00445         if (!debug) {
00446                 remove(datafile); 
00447                 remove(scriptfile);
00448         }

00450

00452 
00453         fprintf(stdout, "\nusing oscillator constant: hbar Omega = %8.3f MeV\n",
00454                         omega*hbc);
00455 
00456         fprintf(stdout, "\nproton levels:\n");
00457         for (i=0; i<A; i++)

00459                 fprintf(stdout, "[%d]\te: %8.3f MeV, j: %5.3f, l: %5.3f, nosci: %5.3f\n",
00460                                 sp[i].idx, hbc*sp[i].e, angroot(sp[i].j2), angroot(sp[i].l2),
00461                                 sp[i].hosci/omega-1.5);
00462                 }
00463 
00464                 fprintf(stdout, "\nneutron levels:\n");
00465                 for (i=0; i<A; i++)
00466                         if (sp[i].t3 < 0.0) {
00467                         fprintf(stdout, "[%d]\te: %8.3f MeV, j: %5.3f, l: %5.3f, nosci: %5.3f\n",
00468                                         sp[i].idx , hbc*sp[i].e, angroot(sp[i].j2), angroot(sp[i].l2),
00469                                         sp[i].hosci/omega-1.5);
00470                         }
